character.age: 320 years, but appears to be in his mid-40s due to magical aging reversal
character.role: Main Protagonist and Hunter of Dark Magic
character.background: Grew up in the dwarven clan of Kragnir, where he was trained in combat and magic. After a tragedy befell his family, he set out on a quest for revenge and to rid the world of dark magic.
character.place-of-birth: Kragnir Dwarven Clan, Deep within the Iron Mountains

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark Brown, worn in a long beard
